actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to clarify the tax treatment of the proceeds from the condemnation of certain forest lands held in trust for the Klamath Indian Tribe.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income, for Internal Revenue Code purposes, all amounts realized by the trust (currently, only gain resulting) from the condemnation of certain forest lands held in trust for the Klamath Indian Tribe in Oregon.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the tax treatment of the proceeds from the condemnation of certain forest lands held in trust for the Klamath Indian Tribe.
